scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Because of Arnow's inconsistent system of numbering and renumbering over the course of revision, the materials in this folder have been arranged by context, rather than page numbers, which often conflict. Heavily edited, with several cut-and-paste sections and comments by an outside reader, usually pertaining to medical issues (presumably Dr. Kahn). Draft includes four handwritten pages, probably unconnected to each other, of preliminary drafts. Draft of Section II, titled Part II Decrepitude, p. 1-47, missing p. 3 and 5. Self-edited, with many cuts suggested in pencil.
